ci_support_linux_64_r_base4.4.yaml:
cdt_name:
- conda
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
cran_mirror:
- https://cran.r-project.org
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
pin_run_as_build:
  r-base:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
r_base:
- '4.4'
target_platform:
- linux-64

about.summary: Several non parametric randomness tests for numeric sequences
Several non parametric randomness tests for numeric sequences

name: r-randtests
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = "1.0.2" %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-randtests
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/randtests_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/randtests/randtests_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: aa9906c639f10a38fae48657f83bbf1e7170cdca4df9886ae555b2bace053afb

build:
  noarch: generic
  number: 2
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:

  host:
    - r-base
  run:
    - r-base

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('randtests')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('randtests')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=randtests
  license: GPL (>= 2)
  summary: Several non parametric randomness tests for numeric sequences
  license_family: GPL3
  license_file: {{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/GPL-2

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r

# Package: randtests
# Type: Package
# Title: Testing randomness in R
# Version: 1.0
# Date: 2014-11-16
# Author: Frederico Caeiro and Ayana Mateus
# Maintainer: Frederico Caeiro <fac@fct.unl.pt>
# Description: Several non parametric randomness tests for numeric sequences
# License: GPL (>= 2)
# LazyLoad: yes
# Packaged: 2014-11-16 22:29:17 UTC; fac
# NeedsCompilation: no
# Repository: CRAN
# Date/Publication: 2014-11-17 00:02:16
